text_en: 770 Clinical Descriptions and Diagnostic Requirements for ICD-11 Mental, Behavioural or Neurodevelopmental Disorders ICD-11 ICD-10 Notes 6C40.6 Alcohol-induced psychotic disorder F10.5 Mental and behavioural disorders due to use of alcohol: psychotic disorder 6C40.60 Alcohol-induced psychotic disorder with F10.52 Mental and behavioural disorders due to use of hallucinations alcohol:
